subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Marlins said Stanton, the major league leader in runs batted in, was being treated at a hospital for a facial cut after he was hit by an 88-mile-per-hour pitch.
snippet: The Marlins said Stanton, the major league leader in runs batted in, was being treated at a hospital for a facial cut after he was hit by an 88-mile-per-hour pitch.
